cmput301w16t01crimsonhorizons.parkinghelper

Class ElasticSearchCtr

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t01crimsonhorizons.parkinghelper.ElasticSearchCtr

  • public class ElasticSearchCtr
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Kevin L on 2/24/2016. This is the main interface that uses JestDroid to access and modify data on elastic search. The elastic search database we use is http://cmput301.softwareprocess.es:8080/t01/user_database and http://cmput301.softwareprocess.es:8080/t01/stall_database
